page.title: 06Molins sports ground Monks R
page.content: Molins sports ground is situated in Mill Lane, Monks Risborough. It is the sports and social club facilities for the Molins Engieering Company of Haw lane,Saunderton. It's a 10 acre site with excellent sports and social facilities. There is a fine social club and changing facilities which had to be compleatly rebuilt several years ago following a fire which destroyed the old building. Sports facilities consists of a cricket square and outfield which is of such a high standard that it is used by the Bucks. County Cricket Club every year for a minor counties cricket match. There are 2 full sized football pitches ,3 all weather tennis courts,a hard netball area and a 6 rink bowling green,there is also a small corner set aside for the children with a slide, a roundabout
